content.query:
use nyc_taxi_discovery;

select 
*
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as cal;

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'select 
*
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''calendar.csv'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
    FORMAT =''CSV'',
    PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as cal
'

select 
*
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) WITH (
    date_key INT,
    date DATE,
    year SMALLINT,
    month TINYINT,
    day TINYINT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    day_of_year SMALLINT,
    week_of_month TINYINT,
    week_of_year TINYINT,
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    year_month INT,
    year_week INT

)
 as cal;
